features: Made of 100% recycled polyester woven ripstop with 50+ UPF sun protection
Made of 100% recycled polyester woven ripstop with 50+ UPF sun protection
Patch chest pockets with button-and-loop flap closures; left pen pocket; lower-left side-panel snap pocket for small items
Midback vertical vents for ease of movement and ventilation even when wearing a backpack
A shirttail hem keeps your shirt in place during movement and stays put under a hipbelt
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
Body: 2.8-oz 100% recycled polyester woven ripstop with 50+ UPF sun protection. Back panel: 2.1-oz 100% recycled polyester warp-knit tricot mesh. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
